content: update december 8 2021 i m happy to inform that i have added the ability to crochet this blanket using the **interlocking filet crochet** technique enjoy crocheting mosaic crochet files remained unchanged for the **solid overlay mosaic crochet** you need to download the files 1 a midsummer night s dream solid mosaic - written pattern for crocheting in the round and for bottom up row by row clickable table of contents on page 3 at the bottom of the page 2 mosaic solid in the round charts - charts for crocheting in the round 3 mosaic solid row by row charts - charts for crocheting bottom up row by row for a slightly lighter and thinner blanket than a solid mosaic blanket **overlay mosaic crochet** you need to download the files 1 a midsummer night s dream mosaic - written pattern for crocheting in the round and for bottom up row by row clickable table of contents on page 3 at the bottom of the page 2 mosaic in the round charts - charts for crocheting in the round 3 mosaic row by row charts - charts for crocheting bottom up row by row for **solid interlocking filet crochet** you need to download files 1 a midsummer night s dream solid int - written pattern for crocheting in the round and for bottom up row by row clickable table of contents on page 3 at the bottom of the page 2 interl solid in the round charts - charts for crocheting in the round 3 interl solid row by row charts - charts for crocheting bottom up row by row please note that this pattern requires a lot of attention and careful reading of the instructions for **interlocking filet crochet** you need to download files 1 a midsummer night s dream int - written pattern for crocheting in the round and for bottom up row by row clickable table of contents on page 3 at the bottom of the page 2 interl in the round charts - charts for crocheting in the round 3 interlock row by row charts - charts for crocheting bottom up row by row *for both techniques it is possible crochet only the main part of the blanket and then crochet the envelope border mosaic or the border interlocking filet in the round * ___________ upd you can choose the option that you like best with dcs side by side solid mosaic or there is always single_crochet between dcs you require two colors of yarn one for the main background colour b and one contrasting colour a terminology all crochet terms used are u s technique overlay mosaic crochet solid several dcs side by side in the round or from bottom to top row by row yarn scheepjes stone washed yarn weight sport ball weight 50 g yarn length 130 m 142 17 yds gauge 10 stitches in 5cm 2 by 10 row in 5cm 2 in mosaic stitch pattern using a different gauge won t
